overview.description: Our village has various committees working for the development and welfare of the community. Each committee focuses on specific areas to ensure comprehensive growth and better services for all residents.

janArogyaSamiti.title: Jan Arogya Samiti
janArogyaSamiti.subtitle: Promoting Health and Wellness in Our Village
janArogyaSamiti.description: The Jan Arogya Samiti is dedicated to providing comprehensive healthcare services and promoting health awareness among all villagers. Our committee works tirelessly to ensure the well-being of every community member through various health initiatives and programs.
janArogyaSamiti.additionalInfo: We focus on preventive healthcare, maternal and child health, immunization programs, and health education to create a healthier community for all residents.
responsibilitiesList: Organize regular health camps and medical check-ups
Conduct immunization programs for children and adults
Provide health education and awareness programs
Monitor maternal and child health services
Ensure proper sanitation and hygiene practices
Coordinate with government health departments
Maintain health records and statistics
Provide emergency health assistance when needed
healthTipsList: Drink clean and safe water daily
Eat a balanced diet with fresh vegetables and fruits
Exercise regularly and stay physically active
Get regular health check-ups and vaccinations
Practice safe food handling and storage
Keep your surroundings clean and waste-free
Seek medical help immediately when feeling unwell

krishiVikasSamiti.title: Krishi Vikas Samiti
krishiVikasSamiti.pageTitle: Krishi Vikas Samiti - Agriculture Development Committee
krishiVikasSamiti.subtitle: Promoting Agricultural Development and Farmer Welfare
krishiVikasSamiti.description: The Krishi Vikas Samiti is dedicated to promoting agricultural development, modern farming techniques, and ensuring the welfare of farmers in our village. Our committee works towards sustainable agriculture and improved farming practices.

shaleyVyavasthapanSamiti.title: Shaley Vyavasthapan Samiti
shaleyVyavasthapanSamiti.pageTitle: Shaley Vyavasthapan Samiti - School Management Committee
shaleyVyavasthapanSamiti.description: The Shaley Vyavasthapan Samiti is responsible for the proper management and administration of schools in our village. Our committee ensures quality education, proper infrastructure, and effective school operations for the benefit of all students.
shaleyVyavasthapanSamiti.additionalInfo: We focus on teacher recruitment, educational materials, school development, and maintaining high standards of education in our village schools.
responsibilitiesList: Ensure proper management and administration of schools
Recruit and manage qualified teachers
Provide necessary educational materials and resources
Plan and implement school development programs
Monitor school performance and student progress
Coordinate with education department officials
Maintain school infrastructure and facilities
Organize educational events and programs

rastaArakhaSamiti.title: Rasta Arakha Samiti
rastaArakhaSamiti.pageTitle: Rasta Arakha Samiti - Road Development Committee
rastaArakhaSamiti.subtitle: Building Better Roads for Better Connectivity
rastaArakhaSamiti.description: The Rasta Arakha Samiti is responsible for the development, maintenance, and improvement of roads and transportation infrastructure in our village. Our committee ensures safe and efficient road connectivity for all residents.
rastaArakhaSamiti.additionalInfo: We focus on road construction, maintenance, safety measures, and ensuring proper connectivity throughout the village for the benefit of all residents.
responsibilitiesList: Maintain and repair existing village roads
Plan and construct new roads for better connectivity
Ensure proper road maintenance and cleanliness
Implement safety measures on village roads
Coordinate with government road departments
Monitor road construction projects
Ensure proper drainage and water management
Organize road safety awareness programs
rastaArakhaSamiti.roadSafetyTips: Road Safety Tips for Village Residents
roadSafetyTipsList: Always follow traffic rules and speed limits
Use proper lighting when walking on roads at night
Keep roads clean and free from debris
Report any road damage or safety hazards immediately
Avoid parking vehicles on main roads

mahimAhilyadeviLokSanchalitSadhanKendra.title: Mahim Ahilyadevi Lok Sanchalit Sadhan Kendra
mahimAhilyadeviLokSanchalitSadhanKendra.pageTitle: Mahim Ahilyadevi Lok Sanchalit Sadhan Kendra
mahimAhilyadeviLokSanchalitSadhanKendra.subtitle: Community Resource Center - Community Development
mahimAhilyadeviLokSanchalitSadhanKendra.description: Mahim Ahilyadevi Lok Sanchalit Sadhan Kendra is dedicated to community development and social welfare in the village. This center provides comprehensive services to all residents.
mahimAhilyadeviLokSanchalitSadhanKendra.additionalInfo: Our center organizes various programs for social justice, women empowerment, youth development, and community welfare.
mahimAhilyadeviLokSanchalitSadhanKendra.addressValue: Khadak Ozar, Taluka: Nashik, District: Nashik, Maharashtra

gramSansadhanGat.title: Gram Sansadhan Gat
gramSansadhanGat.subtitle: Village Resource Group - Village Development
gramSansadhanGat.description: Gram Sansadhan Gat is responsible for resource management and local development in the village. This group manages all village resources properly.
gramSansadhanGat.additionalInfo: Our group works for comprehensive village development by properly managing natural resources, human resources, and financial resources in the village.

aboutEvents.title: About Events & Activities
aboutEvents.description: Stay updated with the latest events, activities, and initiatives organized by our Gram Panchayat.
aboutEvents.communityEventsDesc: Regular community gatherings, festivals, and cultural programs.
aboutEvents.developmentProgramsDesc: Infrastructure development and welfare programs for the village.
aboutEvents.educationInitiativesDesc: Educational programs and skill development workshops.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: Grampanchayat Khadakozar is committed to serving the community with dedication and transparency. We work towards the development and welfare of our village through various government schemes and initiatives. Our mission is to provide quality services to all residents and ensure the overall progress of our village.

villageOverview.title: Khadakozar Village - A Glance
villageOverview.description: Khadakozar Grampanchayat is a rural self-government institution under Nashik Zilla Parishad, Chandwad Panchayat Samiti. The village has a population of 3487, with Khadakozar being the main village and Gurhale settlement being separate.

Solar dryers for women entrepreneurship development

places.name: Kedrai Mata Dam
places.description: Kedrai Mata Dam is a dam located near Khadakozar village in Chandwad taluka of Nashik district, built on the Vinta river and famous for the Kedrai Mata temple. The sacred shrine of Mata Kedrai is located right next to this dam. This dam provides water supply to the villages in the surrounding area.

features.title: Dam and Surroundings
items: Location: Kedrai Mata Dam is located near Khadakozar village in Chandwad taluka of Nashik district
River: This dam is built on the Vinta river
Reason for Fame: Due to its proximity to the temple, this dam is named Kedrai Mata Dam
Water Supply: This dam provides water supply as a water source to Jopul, Khadakozar, Vadali Bhoi and surrounding villages in the Panchkroshi area

places.name: Kedrai Mata Temple Khadakozar
places.description: Famous Kedrai Mata is a sacred shrine located about two kilometers from Khadakozar village in Chandwad taluka. This shrine is located 6 km from Vadali Bhoi village on Mumbai-Agra National Highway No. 3. There is a huge crowd here on Purnima, Amavasya, Tuesday, Friday and Sunday. Devotees have had faith since ancient times that if couples do not have children/sons, their wishes are fulfilled by taking a bath seven times in the sacred pond here. This goddess is famous for fulfilling vows.

features.title: Temple Features
items: Ancient Shani, Rahu, Ketu temples near Kedrai Mata temple
Four-faced Hanuman idol is very beautiful
Shivling in the nearby temple
Ancient dipmal (Shivkalin) on the hill in front
Banyan and Peepal trees in the temple premises add to the glory of the shrine
Peaceful, beautiful and pleasant shrine located on the banks of Vinta river
Famous as Kedrai Mata Dam

festivals.title: Festivals and Celebrations
items: Goddess's chariot from the shrine to Khadakozar village with great pomp on Chaitra Vaishakh Navami
All villagers and devotees from Panchkroshi gather in large numbers
Thousands of devotees visit the mother's feet daily during Navratrotsav
Electric lighting and religious program organization

Kedrai to Ganagapur
Kedrai to Jambukeshwar

places.description: Beautiful lake surrounded by greenery, perfect for picnics and nature walks.

features.title: Activities

Fishing
Nature Photography

specialFeatures.title: Special Features
items: Kedrai Mata is a famous awakened temple in Khadakozar village, Chandwad taluka, Nashik district, Maharashtra. Located 6 km from Wadali Bhoy village on Mumbai-Agra National Highway No. 3, this temple sees huge crowds on Amavasya, Purnima, Tuesday, Friday and Sunday. It is known for fulfilling wishes.

Ancient temples of Shani, Rahu, Ketu are located near Kedrai Mata temple. The four-faced Hanuman idol in front of Kedrai Mata is very beautiful and there is a Shivling in the nearby temple. Ancient Shivkalin deepmal can be seen on the hill in front of Kedrai Mata temple.

The temple is famous as Kedrai Mata Dam due to the dam next to the temple. The banyan and peepal trees in the temple premises add to the glory of the temple. This temple located on the banks of Vinta river is very peaceful, beautiful and pleasant.

Since ancient times, the goddess's chariot has been taken out with great pomp from the temple to Khadakozar village on Chaitra Vaishakh Navami. All villagers and devotees from Panch Kroshi gather in large numbers for this chariot procession. During Navratri, thousands of devotees visit the mother's feet daily.

During this period, the temple administration organizes electric lighting and religious programs. Similarly, foot pilgrimage festivals are held every year from the temple to Kedrai to Shirdi, Kedrai Mata to Gangapur, Kedrai Mata to Trimbakeshwar.

Saptashringi Fort is 28 km from Kedrai Mata temple and Renuka Mata temple in Chandwad is 22 km. Also in the lower eastern range of Sahyadri, near Saptashringi Fort, Markandeya Mountain, Dhodap Fort, Vikhara Mountain, Kanchan Fort, Idrayani Fort, Renuka Temple in Chandwad, Chandreshwar Temple, Ichhapurti Ganesh Temple, famous Rangmahal are historical places that can be seen at a distance of 20 to 25 km.
The distance to Shirdi is 70 to 75 km from here. No matter how much we talk about Kedrai Mata, it is less. We should visit this awakened temple and definitely take the mother's blessings.

The village has been running continuous Hari Nam Saptah for the last 90 years and this year in April 2025, it will complete 90 years continuously and we will celebrate the golden jubilee in another 10 years.
✨ Khadakozar – A small but ideal, prosperous village preserving historical heritage!
Are you ready to visit the village? If yes, go to the location below........
